95651.「アタシのご主人様は 強いだけじゃなく\n おしゃれで かっこいい まもの使いな:
My master is not only strong but also stylish and cool monster master. I want to dress up too, but I don't have the right clothes. Or
rather, the cloth burns. I'm sorry.

95652.「ヨヨ？ アタシに 何か用かしら？<yesno><case 1><close><: Yo yo? You wanted to see me?<yesno><case 1><close><case2><break><case_cancel><break>

95653.「なにヨ。\n いかにもな 目で見てくるから\n かんちがいしちゃったじゃない:
What? You're giving me the wrong impression
because of the way you're looking at me.

95654.<icon_exc>「ヨヨヨ！\n かばん職人？ ガニッポさんが\n アタシのこ:
Yo yo! Bagmaker? Ganippo told you about me. Yo yo Yes.I want a fashionable bag, too. But look at my body. Everything I hold in my
hand turns into a black poppy. But I still want a bag! I want to wear it! That's why I want you to make me a bag that is resistant to
fire and heat. I know it's a difficult order.I know it's a difficult order, but I'll wait forever. I'll be waiting for you.

95655.「かばん職人さんに 伝えてくれる？\n 火と熱に強いかばんを 作ってほしいって。:
Can you tell the bag maker that I want him to make a bag that is resistant to fire and heat? I want him to make a bag that is resistant to
fire and heat. I'm waiting for you.

95656.「え！？ 職人さん 引き受けてくれたの？\n ヨヨヨ<heart> うれしいわ。:
What? Craftsman, you took me on? Yo yo yo<heart>
I'm so happy. I'm looking forward to it.

95657.<icon_exc>「ヨヨヨ！\n それ アタシのかばんヨね？\n そうヨね！？:
<icon_exc>Yo yo yo! Is that my bag? Yes, yes, yes, yes.
Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes.

95658.「うそヨー！\n いじわるしないで 渡してヨー！！\n ヨヨヨ……。:
No way! Don't mess with me, just give it to
me! Yo yo.

95659.「ヨヨヨヨヨヨ<heart>\n 燃えない！ ケシズミにならない！\n すばらし:
Yo yo yo yo yo It won't burn! It doesn't turn into a poppy! Great bag! The design is stylish! The colors are beautiful!The design
is stylish, the colors are beautiful, it's lighter than it looks, it's easy to carry, and it's the perfect size for me!

95660.「ステキだわ！ アタシの注文通り……\n いえ それ以上のかばんを 作ってくれた:
It's beautiful! You made the bag just as I ordered, if not better. I'm really grateful to the craftsman. Thank you, you too. I really
want to give you a hug, but I don't think I should.

95661.モモヨのかばんを 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><break><ca: Would you like me to give you Flameman's Bag?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close>

95663.モモヨは かばんを そっと手にとると\n何も言わず しばらく見つめていた。\n<:
Flameman gently picked up the bag and stared at it for a while without saying anything. No matter how much he tried to change the handle
or put the belt on his shoulder, the bag never caught fire!

95664.「このかばん 気に入ったのヨ！\n 後でご主人様に 見せつけちゃうのヨ！\n<b:
I like this bag! I'm going to show it off to
Master later! Yo yo yo yo<heart>

83031.「ヘヘヘ いいのかい？ 俺の間合いに入ると\n やばいぜ？ 半径２メートルは 俺:
Heh heh heh. You sure? You know you're in my line of sight, don't you? My range is a two- meter radius. Anyone who gets in there is
finished. But you're lucky, the master told me not to slice anyone but monsters. You're lucky you weren't born a monster.
